column1: '''Bernard Cribbins''' is a well-known British comedy actor, of "[http://www.carryonline.com/ Carry On]" fame. His most recent well-known role was playing the recurring character ''Wilfred Mott'' in the popular science-fiction show ''Doctor Who''. He narrated several unspecified episodes of [[Jackanory]]'s telling of ''The Hobbit'' in [[1979]].
